The <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/outlinableregion">OutlinableRegion</a> holds all the information for a specific region, or sequence of instructions. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/outlinableregion/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iroutliner">IROutliner</a></>}>
This class is a pass that identifies similarity in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>, extracts instances of the similarity, and then consolidating the similar regions in an effort to reduce code size. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iroutliner/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/iroutliner/instructionallowed">InstructionAllowed</a></>}>
Custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a> to classify different instructions for whether it can be analyzed for similarity. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/iroutliner/instructionallowed/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iroutlinerpass">IROutlinerPass</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to outline similar regions. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iroutlinerpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of code.  It evaluates each set of IRSimilarityCandidates with an estimate of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whether it will provide code size reduction.  Each region is extracted using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// \\code</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %1 = add i32 %a, %b</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class is a pass that identifies similarity in a Module, extracts</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instances of the similarity, and then consolidating the similar regions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in an effort to reduce code size.  It uses the IRSimilarityIdentifier pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to identify the similar regions of code, and then extracts the similar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sections into a single function.  See the above for an example as to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">/// how code is extracted and consolidated into a single function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check whether an OutlinableRegion is incompatible with code already</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// outlined. OutlinableRegions are incomptaible when there are overlapping</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instructions, or code that has not been recorded has been added to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param &#91;in&#93; Region - The OutlinableRegion to check for conflicts with</Highlight></CodeLine>
